amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 117-587 to require the report to Congress to include other relevant information which may include recommendations to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of the grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Scanlon.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
